original_text: My enemies, everything that you want to do will be useless. Your thoughts are like dry grass and straw. Your own breath will destroy you, like a fire that burns dry grass. My enemies, everything that you want to do will be useless. Your thoughts are like dry grass and straw. Your own breath will destroy you, like a fire that burns dry grass. My enemies, everything that you want to do will be useless.
korean_text: 너희가 겨를 잉태하고 짚을 해산할 것이며 너희의 호흡은 불이 되어 너희를 삼킬 것이며

sentences.original_text: everything that you want to do will be useless
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 하려는 모든 일은 헛될 것이다

sentences.original_text: Your thoughts are like dry grass and straw
sentences.korean_translation: 너희의 생각은 마른 풀과 짚과 같다

sentences.original_text: Your own breath will destroy you
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 자신의 숨결이 너희를 멸망시킬 것이다

sentences.original_text: like a fire that burns dry grass
